item.title: RT by @SimonRetromania: A mad child was at the helm of our country. And those who knew stayed silent or supported him. And many -who saw the worst of it up close - would put him there again. A crisis of character, integrity, patriotism, responsibility and decency at the highest levels of leadership.
item.dc:creator: @Sifill_LDF
item.description: A mad child was at the helm of our country. And those who knew stayed silent or supported him. And many -who saw the worst of it up close - would put him there again. A crisis of character, integrity, patriotism, responsibility and decency at the highest levels of leadership.

item.title:
RT by @SimonRetromania: Let this sink in.
The former president of the United States knowingly sent an armed mob to the Capitol and wanted to be there to oversee the murder of his political enemies, then be coronated by his mob for another term.
item.dc:creator: @TeaPainUSA
item.description:
Let this sink in.

The former president of the United States knowingly sent an armed mob to the Capitol and wanted to be there to oversee the murder of his political enemies, then be coronated by his mob for another term.

item.title: R to @suzi_writes: No, not at all. Neoliberalism wasn’t a term in parlance then. By ‘liberal’ 1977 era punks meant Guardian-readers, social workers, etc. Much closer to what we would nowadays call progressives.
item.dc:creator: @SimonRetromania
item.description: No, not at all. Neoliberalism wasn’t a term in parlance then. By ‘liberal’ 1977 era punks meant Guardian-readers, social workers, etc. Much closer to what we would nowadays call progressives.

item.title: RT by @SimonRetromania: Geoff Dunbar, "Ubu" (1979), Arena. The television premiere of Geoff Dunbar’s brilliant animation film. Based on Alfred Jarry’s notorious surrealist hero, Pere Ubu, it chronicles the rise to power of a kind of punk Macbeth: https://ubu.com/film/jarry_arena.html
item.dc:creator: @ubuweb
item.description: Geoff Dunbar, "Ubu" (1979), Arena. The television premiere of Geoff Dunbar’s brilliant animation film. Based on Alfred Jarry’s notorious surrealist hero, Pere Ubu, it chronicles the rise to power of a kind of punk Macbeth: ubu.com/film/jarry_arena.htm…

item.title:
RT by @SimonRetromania: For @nobellsblog, I wrote about the cult of Drain Gang—how the Swedish collective rose from unknowns to be one of the most thrilling and influential music groups of this era, with a focus on Bladee.
https://nobells.blog/cult-of-drain-gang/

item.title:
RT by @SimonRetromania: There is no such thing as being “pro-life” while supporting laws that let children be shot in their schools, elders in grocery stores, worshippers in their houses of faith, survivors by abusers, or anyone in a crowded place.
It is an idolatry of violence. And it must end.
item.dc:creator: @AOC
item.description:
There is no such thing as being “pro-life” while supporting laws that let children be shot in their schools, elders in grocery stores, worshippers in their houses of faith, survivors by abusers, or anyone in a crowded place.

It is an idolatry of violence. And it must end.

item.title:
RT by @SimonRetromania: I spoke to a councilor from a tiny town in Wales, who resigned from his post after rumor spread that he’s Banksy
“I don’t know if I’m in some mad, fantastic kind of delusion or some dreadful nightmare,” he said.
https://www.insider.com/who-is-banksy-artist-identity-william-gannon-pembroke-wales-2022-5
item.dc:creator: @kieranpressreyn
item.description:
